item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

k got my first problem solves tyvm i vain i =p

now pvp every where is 10 wild and i want to make it say what level you can attack
i know the code below is what needs to be changed what do i change it too

			if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
				if(inMulti()) {
					getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199);
				} else {
					getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199);
				}
			} else {
				getPA().multiWay(-1);
				getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199);
			}

also what is the wild boolean to make area safe
